history.proof: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal. simpl. sauto q: on depth: 3use: ModuleSpace, scal_distr_r.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of ModuleSpace.ax1 (ModuleSpace.scal _ _ _ _ (ModuleSpace.scal _ _ _ _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of scal_distr_r (scal (plus _ _) _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring U, V : ModuleSpace K x, y : K u : U * V Unable to unify "(scal (mult x y) (fst u), scal (mult x y) (snd u))" with "(scal x (scal y (fst u)), scal x (scal y (snd u)))".

original: intros x y u. unfold prod_scal. simpl. rewrite ModuleSpace.ax1. rewrite scal_distr_r. reflexivity.
